system.description:
A polished, roughly hewn piece of decorative stone (e.g. agate) which afflicts the owner with a curse of slow movement.

  • Flight: The curse takes effect when the character attempts to flee from an enemy (whether in combat or in pursuit).

  • Effect: The character’s movement rate is halved and they can only attack or cast spells every second round.

  • Discarding the stone: The stone reappears, hidden somewhere on the character’s person, unless the curse is removed by magic (e.g. @UUID[Compendium.ose-advancedfantasytome.spells.Item.LvD3XbuvgBpJ5eEL]{remove curse}).
